name: Glen Creek
description:
Introduction

Upon initial search, canyoning in this canyon is prohibited as it is in a state park (Glen Watkins State Park). This canyon is extremely picturesque and features 19 waterfalls in the span of 1.5 miles (not necessarily rappels though). Trip reports have alluded to this place as Rivendell from Lord of the Rings.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
